data.title: Gibson Sotheby's International Realty
data.meta_description: Meet Stephanie Geary with Gibson Sotheby's International Realty. Contact us for all things real estate in the cities, suburbs, and shores of Massachusetts and New Hampshire. We look forward to working with you!
data.text:
Stephanie Geary is a Southern New Hampshire real estate agent who works with home buyers and sellers. After graduating from Northeastern University, Stephanie attended the University of Cincinnati and earned a master’s degree in criminal justice. Stephanie worked as a research analyst for the Massachusetts Parole Board where she analyzed data & trends and prepared detailed reports as to her findings- some of which were published in the American Probation and Parole Association’s Perspectives Journal. Her enthusiasm for helping others, keen eye, and attention to detail help her connect with clients and provide them the best service possible.

Stephanie and her husband reside in Danville, New Hampshire with their two children. When Stephanie is not assisting her real estate clients or watching her kids play sports, she enjoys decorating, spending time with her family, camping, and raising goats, chickens & pigs on her land in Danville, New Hampshire. She is passionate about giving back to the community by volunteering as treasurer for the local PTA and coaching multiple sports throughout the seasons.

Stephanie will dedicate her unique talent, strong analytical energy and creativity to give you the personal service you deserve. She is part of the Leva Group within Gibson Sotheby’s International Realty, and together they take their clients through the real estate process from beginning to end, handling every detail positively and professionally. The Leva Group services buyers and sellers, residential and commercial in all areas in New Hampshire and Massachusetts. Whether a client is looking to buy or sell a home, an investment or commercial property, raw land for development or a retirement home on a lake, they will ensure a positive, thorough and personal experience.
